column1: slow and skiddy to start, on middle, pushed to cover

is he gone? Ronchi is walking off. What a masterstroke from McCullum! Ronchi is bowled for 0. It was very slow on middle, eliciting a big stroke from Ronchi. The big stroke was an awkward hoick across the line, playing too early. He missed the ball by quite a bit, the ball went on and clipped the top of the leg bail.
short outside off, punched to long-on from the back foot
another slider, flat on middle and leg, skids in, takes the inside edge back towards the keeper
short and wide and soooo slow. Farhan waits and waits and still misses a cut
on middle and leg, skewed away towards midwicket
some movement. Full outside off, the ball moving away, pushed away to mid-off. Maybe a slip or two? None currently
on middle and leg, worked away to midwicket from the crease
on a length, 132 kph, clipped to midwicket. Not much movement but the channel is good.
a shortish delivery outside off, Farhan hammers the ball back with a mis-timed pull. Past the bowler and mid-off for a couple. McCullum cuts it off
drifts down leg this time, Farhan can't get bat on that. Should have scored off that. Off the pad to the keeper
flies away down to third man. Back of a length outside off, a thrashy cut races down to third man
slow and wide, smashed to long-off from the back foot
too full outside off, Duminy drills a drive back past his partner with fierce power. Races away. Lovely shot, full face of the bat, hitting with the spin
shortish and slow down leg, nudged to deep midwicket
slow outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short and straight, skidding on. Slapped away towards wide mid-on for a single
Duminy dances down and clips the ball past midwicket for a run to long-on
a poor delivery is picked away for four. On the pads and Duminy rolls his wrists to find the gap behind square for four
a full straight delivery, swinging in towards off. A thick inside edge onto the pads, for a run to cover
a good length delivery, around off, punched back to the bowler. Very good line
a shortish delivery outside off, Farhan is looking to smash the ball instead of rely on timing. Another mis-timed pull to mid-off
length, around off, pushed to cover. Another dot. Lots of pressure.

not very impressive batting. A back of a length delivery around off, Farhan looks to smash the ball over midwicket, but his timing and is terrible. He doesn't have enough power either. The ball lands in Narine's hands at long-on. What was he doing playing that shot with that fielder there?
wow, that one turned, a ripper! Play that. Tossed up down leg, the ball turns square and beats Duminy on the outside edge.
more flight down leg, patted back quietly by JP.
flatter around off, pushed through in the air, tapped away to point
another spitting cobra of an offbreak! Slow around leg, it turns and beats JP by a mile.
slow down leg, clipped to midwicket. Bat on ball!
a thick inside edge through square leg for a run. Spoils the maiden. Stunning bowling from Narine, sussed out conditions very early and didn't try too hard
good length outside off, carved down to third man for a run
a slower ball outside off, pushed away to cover
another slower delivery outside off, dabbed down to third man for one more
full outside off, 136 kph, carved to backward point, flies to the fielder
lovely shot. Short and wide from the Fizz, slashed away behind point for four. All timing
a slower cutter again outside off, chopped away to point
the flat, straight delivery, pushed back to the bowler
a wild slog sweep, tossed up outside off, the ball goes under Misbah's heave
quick and wide outside off, pushed away towards cover
a nice single, slow outside off, pushed in front of point for a run
flat and wide, punched off the back foot to the sweeper cover
slow around middle and leg, played away to point
shortish and wide outside off, sliced away to backward point
well bowled, seed Misbah coming so Yasir shortens the length, carved to point again. Wily leggie
the googly outside off, pulled to deep midwicket
slow outside off, spins through a massive gap between bat and pad. Just misses off stump. That slower pace does for him again

did that pitch in line? A googly on middle and leg, Duminy can't connect with a pull and he has been struck right in front! Duminy reviews. No bat on that. It did pitch outside indeed. That was a decision based on the shot, not necessarily the events that preceded it.
slow through the air, Duminy inside-edges that to midwicket

edged and gone first ball! What a start that is for Irshad. A length delivery outside off, it skids on and Misbah can't keep up with it. It angles away with that angle and Misbah nicks off. Islamabad sink further
that flies away for four. A slingy action taking batsmen aback. Short down leg, just nudged fine, races away to fine leg
full and straight, 136 kph, pushed back to the bowler
short and wide, 137 kph, hammered away to the sweeper cover for a run
good length delivery, slightly wide, punched into the gap at cover
full on middle and leg, clipped away to long-on
lots of flight on middle, pushed to long-on
the googly around off, Duminy goes right back in his crease to defend
slow outside off, Duminy gets forward, closes any gap between bat and pad and blocks
uses his feet, runs to the pitch and pushes the ball to long-on
short down leg, 90 kph, nudged to deep midwicket
overly short again, Duminy clips away to deep midwicket from the crease
how did that miss? Pitched way down leg, forcing Duminy to think of working the ball but the ball turns square and beats the bat, hits the back pad
slow outside off, pushed away to deep cover
a carrom ball outside off, guided away to backward point
another carrom ball, short and wide, slashed towards point
past slip for a couple. Very slow through the air, Duminy chases after the ball, gets a thick outside edge for two towards third man
slow and straight, defended by Duminy
a yorker on leg, jammed back to the bowler
Samit picks out long-on. It's a googly outside off, Samit stays low and slog-sweeps the ball to long-on. He felt he needed to go but he can't time the shot. Straight to the man. Islamabad sink deeper
full and wide outside off, driven away towards the bowler. Yasir gets across to his right, but the ball sneaks underneath his hand
the googly outside off, a thick outside edge towards backward point for a run
slow around off, another defensive block
that's more like it. A tossed up legbreak outside off, Duminy gets underneath the length and nails a lofted drive with fierce power over cover. Sublime timing, waited for the bowler to err
a shortish delivery down leg, Asif rolls his wrists and flicks the ball nonchalantly into the gap behind square leg. Very neat stroke

it was the sweeper cover's catch but McCullum wants it. The captain runs back from cover, Akhtar runs in from deep cover, the ball lands right in between them and somehow the two fielders don't collide, thankfully! Dropped
on the pads, nudged away to square leg
full and wide, 143 kph, drilled to deep cover. The fielder falls over as he fields, allowing the second run
lucky! Four more. Back of a length outside off, 140 kph, a wild swing from Asif, misses the stumps as the ball takes the inside edge en route to the fine leg boundary
121 kph, a slower wide delivery outside off, hit away to McCullum at cover
flat and quick on the pads, worked away to square leg for one
ooh that races away for four. Full and wide from Yasir, Asif scythes the ball away off the open face through point. Fantastic timing
the wild slog sweep and Asif is cleaned up. Flat and straight, Asif stays low, looking to heave but fails to pick the right delivery, it's flat and quick, goes through and hits the stumps.
full and straight, hit away to long-on
that one looked out! And Duminy is gone. Legbreak outside off, the ball spinning back in, hits Duminy in front of middle. Absolutely plumb! Just failed to account for that much turn.
tossed up outside off, stylishly clipped to long-on
the sweep, not a bad shot on a turning pitch, swept away towards deep backward square leg
the carrom ball on middle and leg, nudged into the leg side
a leading edge, falls safely into no-man's land at midwicket. Looked to flick, but there was too much turn
slow down leg, the ball rips past the outside edge
looking for the reverse sweep, full and wide outside off, Talat can't make contact
beaten on the outside edge again. Pitches outside leg, and beats Talat on the outside edge. 4-0-10-0 for Narine.
full on middle stump, goes across Russell as he muscles towards mid off
offcutter on off stump, shuffles across to the off side and flicks to eep midwicket
Into the stands! It was full and wide outside off, gets his bat under the ball, and slogs this inside out over wide long off. Terrific
back of a length on leg stump, cramped for room. Tapped to midwicket softly enough for Russell to return for the second
good length on leg stump again, flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
good length on off stump, muscles this square towards the man in the deep. A mistimed pull, really
onto the roof! It's full on leg stump, and Hussain gets his front foot out of the way. Smacks it through the ball's line and I think it's gone into the parking lot. New balls, please!
low full toss on leg stump, tapped back to the bowler, and Sohail sticks his hand out. The ball hits his palm, thereby trickling away towards mid on

they're appealing for the catch! What's happened here? Good length on off stump, and it's been muscled back to the bowler. The ball hits his boot, and then goes to mid off on the full. Sohail thinks its out, but replays show the ball dropped just before hitting Sohail's boot.
short and wide outside off, slows things down this time. Forces Russell to reach at it, and mistimed to point
back of a length slower ball on leg stump, goes towards the leg side and pokes to point. They race across for the quick single
short on off stump, zips over the batsman's head. Too high, in fact.
full and wide outside off stump, the batsman doesn't bother chasing it. It's beyond the tram lines. Tried the back-of-the-hand slower ball, but not excecuted well
full and wide outside off, just inside the tramlines as Russell can't swipe this away. Through to the keeper
full outside off stump, comfortably sent packing into the long-on stands! Stands tall for this ball and pings this over the boundary for six more. Stayed very still while playing that
almost a yorker on middle and leg, squeezes this shot towards deep backward square
good length on off stump, turns it past his hips to deep backward square for a single
short on middle and leg, angles into Hussain, who tries to pull. Can't connect well, as it comes off the bat's top half. Dribbles away to midwicket
yorker on off stump, Russell can't do much with it. Bunted down to long off
short on off stump, tries to swivel and pull, but top edged! Falls safe just beyond square leg, though. They walk across for the single

good length on off stump, angles across his body, and cuts to point. Russell has taken off for the single, but his partner isn't even looking! Soft throw from the fielder to the bowler, and the bails are taken off. Russell has to go off. Big mix-up between the two. The West Indian isn't happy
short on middle stump, emphatically pulled to deep backward square. Excellent work from the man in the deep, who slides across to his right and gets his body behind the ball. Well stopped
short on middle and leg, tries to pull but can't connect. A well-directed bouncer from Sohail
slower ball, on a good length. Pitches on leg stump and loops through. Big wind up from Faheem, but he can't connect with the leg-side slog. The ball goes under his bat
another slower one. It's a good-length ball on leg stump. Tries to pull this fine down the leg side but can't connect. Called wide by the umpire, though

full on off stump, it's hit well to long off, but the man's positioned there. Comfortably pouched by Narine in the deep. Off the bat's middle, but hit straight to the West Indian. Faheem goes for a duck
slower ball, full on leg stump. Slogs it off the bat's toe end to deep backward square. Chase for the man in the deep
yorker on off stump, dug away to point and they're off for the quick single. Yasir takes a shy at the stumps, but misses the direct-hit at the non-striker's.
low full toss outside leg stump, the batsman's made some extra room anyway and Fizz follows him really. Muscled down the ground to long on

threads the gap! Useful runs here. Fizz sees the batsman back away and follows him towards the leg side, but the low full toss is well connected by the batsman. Struck well enough to beat deep midwicket and deep backward square
short on off stump, tries to pull but can't get bat to ball. Hits his shoulder and through to short third man. Given as runs, though

taken on the sixth chance! Umar Akmal the one. Juggles so many times at long-on before completing the catch. Full on off stump and muscled over Fizz's head. Akmal races to his left, grabs the ball, but it pops out. Grabs it again, pops out again. Repeats this cycle thrice over before completing the catch. The owner is delighted!
short on middle stump, hoicked to deep midwicket. It's top edged, and Yasir's getting under it. Dropped though! And they come back for the second. Islamabad finish on 121 for 9
starts off with a boundary! Good length on off stump, Akmal walks across to the off side and paddles this behind square. Beats short third man and races away thereafter
full on off stump, spins away from Akmal. Tries to slog-sweep but can't connect as the ball spins across his bat's face

full on off stump, tries to sweep but misses. Hits his front pad just in front of leg stump. Big appeal for lbw, but turned down. Was that missing leg stump? Guess we'll find out. Misbah reviews. There's no bat involved, atleast. Impact is in front of middle stump, but the ball slides across. Would've missed leg stump. Islamabad lose the review inside the first three balls

strikes this time! But Akmal reviews. Full on middle stump, and Akmal misses the straight drive. Hits his back pad, and this time the lbw appeal is given. Hit him in front of middle stump but was there any inside edge? We wait for the replays. It may be sliding down leg once again as well. Yes, it's crashing into leg stump. Akmal has to go, but Lahore get their review back

given! First-ball duck! Full on leg stump, tries to sweep but the ball slides under his bat. Hit him in front of leg stump, and the umpire raises his finger. Fakhar's not reviewing either. He should've though, the ball pitched outside leg. Lahore in big trouble
full on off stump, big stride forward and driven back to the bowler
good length on off stump, spins into Baz. Tapped off the back foot to JP
tossed up full outside off, pushed to cover with soft hands, they scamper across
full outside off, defended towards cover but says 'no' to the single
full outside off, once again tries to push towards cover for a quick run. Sent back by the non-striker
full and wide outside off, and it's the classic Baz drive. Leans into the drive and pushed between cover and mid off. Creamed for a boundary
full and wide outside off again, driven towards cover point, but there's a misfield there. Allows Baz to come back for the second
full outside off stump, spins inwards. Driven off the back foot towards cover
good length outside off again, but it's the one that goes straight through. Extra bounce and he can't push this away. Through to the keeper
full on middle stump, mistimes his straight drive. Inside edge takes it towards mid on
tossed up on off stump, big stride forward and blocked
full and wide outside off, defended towards cover. But no run on offer
full on off stump, walks across to the off side and fends off the back foot
glorious! Stands tall and punched past cover point! Short and wide outside off, send packing past the off-side field. Carved off the back foot
back of a length on off stump, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot, but only to cover point
back of a length outside off, tiptoes and opens his bat's face. Runs it down fine. Fine enough to beat third man. Well played by Salman
good length on middle stump, walks towards the off side and flicks towards square leg
short and wide outside off, slashes hard at it, and finds the top edge. Hit hard enough to bounce away fine for another boundary. Expensive from Sami
back of a length outside off, rocks onto the back foot and cuts to point. Can't beat the infielder though
full on off stump, walks down the ground and nudges towards cow corner. Played gently enough for them to come back for the second

carved square! It's pitched full, and he drives with the bat's open face. Great use of the wrists, but poor fielding from Talat at cover point. He dives over it, and the ball goes for another boundary
full outside off, prods forward and drives to long off
full on off stump, spins inwards. Defended back
full outside off, defended towards cover with soft hands. No run
full on off stump, spins away from the batsman. Punched down the ground
full outside off, spins away. Defended to cover with soft hands
good length on off stump, tapped back to the bowler
full outside off, driven uppishly over cover. Beats the infielder, and skids away off this surface. Useful boundary after three dots
full on middle stump, it's the wrong'un. The batsman manages to find a little edge as he flicks fine down the leg side. No chance for Samit Patel at short fine leg
full on middle stump, spinning away from him, and driven to Misbah on the off side
back of a length on off stump, defended with soft hands for a quick single
short on middle stump, fended off the back foot with soft hands. Drops his hands on his shot, as the ball lands near his toe
good length outside off stump, opens his bat's face and runs it down to third man
good length on off stump once again. Stays on the back foot and defended back to Russell
back of a length on middle and leg, bends his knee and drags his pull behind square. Enough behind that shot as the ball races away to the backward-square boundary
full on off stump, driven down the ground to long on
full outside off stump, prods forward and taps it to deep point. They walk across for the single
full outside off stump, crunches this drive towards the off side, but only to Patel at deep extra cover
full and wide outside off, defended off the front foot towards cover. Played with very soft hands
full on middle and leg, turns this off his toes to short fine leg. He wants the single, but they choose against it eventually
full on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to the gap past midwicket. Baz calls early for the second, and there's the team fifty
good length outside off, spins away further. Mistimes his cut to point
full on leg stump, pushed towards square leg off the back foot. They walk across for the single
full and wide outside off, stays a bit too low! Tries to cut but can't connect
full on off stump, once again misses the cut off the back foot. Slides through to the keeper
full on middle stump, plays the reverse sweep, but paddled straight to short third man. He's lucky it fell just short of the fielder
full on off stump, no spin this time. Driven to long off for a single
full on off stump, spins away from the right-hander. Driven towards cover point
tossed up, and punished! Full on off stump, but he's quick to gauge the length. Big stride forward, down on one knee, and slapped over long on
it's bigger! Full on middle stump, and it's been shoveled towards the leg side. Manages to get under the ball and it's been lifted beyond cow corner
good length on middle stump, goes onto the back foot and nudges towards square leg for a single
good length on off stump, walks across to the off side and nudges to square leg once again
full on middle stump, uses his wrists to flick towards midwicket for a quick run
good length on middle stump, uses the depth of his crease to go back, and punches square on the leg side. Goes to cow corner
full and wide outside off. It's the quicker one, and Baz taps it away from him past backward point
tossed up on off stump, slides across the batsman, but driven with the bat's open face to deep extra cover
full on middle and leg, flicked to square leg off the back foot. Turns the single down
short outside leg stump, spins down the leg side further as the keeper can't hold onto it. Baz misses the pull, but distracts the keeper in the process too. Wide and free runs
full and wide outside leg stump once again. Misbah doesn't look happy
full on leg stump, clipped off his pads to square leg. Big 'no' for the run
full on middle stump, backs away towards the leg side and bunts this down the ground to long off. Time out as well
good length on middle and leg, swivels and drags his pull towards the leg side. Comes off his thigh guard and through to short fine leg
out to the short ball! A well-directed bouncer on middle stump, does well to hook towards the leg side, but top edged to Patel at fine leg. Sami is pumped!. An excellent innings comes to an end
back of a length outside off, walks across to the off side and defends off the back foot

good length wide outside off, cut off the back foot past backward point. Good effort from the infielder, who tries to dive to his left, but he can't hold on to it. Trickles down to the man in the deep
good length on off stump, angling into Baz. Defended off the back foot towards midwicket
full outside off, pushes it off the front foot towards cover. Hit too hard for them to take the run. Over
back of a length outside off, walks towards the ball and punches square to point. No run
back of a length on off stump, mistimes his pull to midwicket. Misfield from the man there, allows the batsman to take the single
quick! Good length on middle stump, and angling into the batsman. Can't flick it towards the leg side. Hits his thigh pad
good length on off stump, pulled along the carpet to deep midwicket. They walk across comfortably
full on middle stump, does well to dig it out. Tapped back to mid off
good length on off stump, Baz tries to pull towards midwicket, but the ball stays low. Hits him where no man wants to get hit. Ouch!

short on middle stump, the batsman doesn't duck, and it comes off his arm guard. Lobs into the air, and taken acrobatically by the keeper. The umpire's given it out, but Ramdin reviews straightaway. Has it hit the glove? Replays sure make it look like. Comes off the glove/arm-guard simultaneously. He'll have to go. A well-directed bouncer earns him the wicket
back of a length on middle stump, forces him to go onto the back foot and punched to midwicket
good length on off stump, angling into his pads, forcing the batsman to play at it. Nudged towards square leg
good length on the fourth-stump line. The batsman goes poking at it but the ball shapes away slightly. Can't glance this down to third man
ood length on off stump, opens his bat's face and pushes towards cover point. They take off tentatively for a single
good length on middle stump, flicked off his pads to Patel at fine leg
back of a length on off stump, stays on the back foot and punched back to the bowler
full on off stump, no footwork but driven nonetheless to cover
full and wide outside off, the batsman backs away towards the leg side and Russell bowls too far from his reach. Useful dot
back of a length outside off, opens his bat's face and runs it down to backward point. They can't take the single
full outside off stump, tries to slog down the ground but mistimed. Bunted down the ground to long on
back of a length on off stump, tiptoes and runs it down to third man. He'll keep strike
good length outside off, angling into his body. Opens his bat's face and runs it down to deep backward point
it had to come, and what a time to get the six! That'll get some pressure off Lahore. Full outside off stump, BMac walks down the wicket, and wristily flicks over cow corner. Effortless!
good length on off stump, swivels and mistimes his pull to deep backward square
short outside off, slashes hard at it, and goes over point. Falls just short of Sami at third man. Could've easily gone down his throat too
good length outside off, keeps the bat's face open and pushes to deep extra cover

excellent take in the deep! Top edges this pull shot, and the skyer is pouched. Short on middle stump, and the pull goes to deep midwicket. The fielder came in too far, and then had to go back, and then dive to his left to complete the catch. Twist in the tale?
full on off stump, backs away and carves his drive past cover. Enough behind that shot, and he's sent his KKR team-mate to the extra-cover boundary!
full on middle stump, stands tall and pulls towards midwicket. Mistimed, but good enough to scamper across for the single
good length on off stump, slight tail into McCullum. Tapped off the back foot, back to Russell
good length on middle and leg, bunts this shot to deep extra cover
shoveled! Full on off stump, and lifted over cover. Narine is great with his bottom hand, and it's in Narine's slot. Sent to the extra-cover boundary!
soft catch! Narine's blitz comes to an end. It was short on middle, and Narine tries to pull. Top edges it, and Misbah composes himself at mid off to complete a single catch
good length on off stump, turned towards the leg side
good length on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
flying catch at midwicket! Back of a length on middle stump, pulled off the back foot, but Asif Ali - at midwicket - charges to his left and takes an excellent catch
good length on off stump, punched off the back foot to long on
full on off stump, turns away towards the off side and McCullum pushes towards midwicket. They scamper across for the single
full on off stump, defended with soft hands towards point. Yasir wants the single, but Baz turns it down
full on off stump, walks down the ground and drives to long off
full on off stump, shoveled to Russell at long on. Misfield from Russell, allowing them to take the extra run. Chance of a run out, but Patel already broke the stumps with his boot
misses everything! Four byes! That's perfect for Lahore. Full on leg stump and McCullum tries to sweep. He misses, nad so does Ronchi. Just misses leg stump, but goes away for four
more drama! He holes out! Straight to long off. Full on off stump, and doesn't have the distance. Pouched in the deep
full on off stump, walks down the wicket and taps it back to the bowler. Excellent line
full on middle stump, needed the single and earns it. Tucked towards the leg side for a single. He'll keep strike
back of of a length on middle and leg, defended down the ground towards the non-striker. Excellent stop by Sami, who dives to his right on his followthrough

Scenes at the PSL! What is happening?! Let me gather my breath. Good-length on middle stump, pulls towards midwicket. Excellent stop by the mid-wicket fielder, who throws the ball towards Sami at the non-striker's. The stumps are broken, but McCullum thinks he's safe. They're taking the second run. But hold on, we're going upstairs. Sami's work at the non-striker's is clean! McCullum has to go. Celebrations in the Islamabad camp

soars over deep point! Takes a wicket first ball, hits a six first ball! It's good length outside off, and he slashes hard at it. Uses the bottom hand and sends this into the stands. Scores are tied!. Unbelievable stuff
super over! Short on middle stump, tries to pull and mistimed. Taken by square leg and we've had an epic finish to regulation time! What scenes
